componentDescription: A customizable UI component for selecting from a list of options.

id.description: Optional string identifier for the select element

error.description: Flag to indicate if the select has an error state

name.description: Name attribute for the select element, useful for form submission

label.description: Label text associated with the select element

colorScheme.description: Defines the color scheme for the select component

helperText.description: Helper text that appears below the select box

placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown when the select is empty

options.description: Array of options that the user can choose from

isReadOnly.description: Boolean to set the select as read-only, preventing user modification

isDisabled.description: Boolean to disable the select element

onChange.description: Function that handles the change event when the selected option(s) change

shape.description: Determines the overall shape of the select box, e.g., rounded or square edges

variant.description: Defines the styling variant for the select component

typeValues: { text?: CSSProperties; icon?: CSSProperties; dropDown?: CSSProperties; selectBox?: CSSProperties; label?: CSSProperties; helperText?: CSSProperties; field?: CSSProperties; }
styles.description: Custom styles that can be applied to the select component

size.description: Defines the size of the component

shadow.description: Determines the shadow property of the select component

isScrollable.description: Boolean to control whether the select options are scrollable

value.description: The current value of the select, either a single string or an array of strings for multi-select

setValue.description: Function to update the value of the select

hide.description: Boolean to control the visibility of dropdown options

setHide.description: Function to toggle the visibility of dropdown options

isHovered.description: Boolean to indicate if the select component is hovered

setIsHovered.description: Function to update the hover state of the component

isFocused.description: Boolean to indicate if the select component is focused

setIsFocused.description: Function to update the focus state of the component
